html: I ordered the Olive Garden “Bottomless Salad Bowl,” and it led me to Narnia.
text: I ordered the Olive Garden “Bottomless Salad Bowl,” and it led me to Narnia.

html: Ever since I scooped my eyes out with a melon baller, the news hasn't bothered me so much.
text: Ever since I scooped my eyes out with a melon baller, the news hasn't bothered me so much.

html: Ugh, my dog's giving me those "Jeff Sessions checking to see if Trump is still mad at him" eyes again.
text: Ugh, my dog's giving me those "Jeff Sessions checking to see if Trump is still mad at him" eyes again.

html: President Trump is sounding more and more like a mob boss. At a press pool this morning, he referred to America as “this thing of ours.”
text: President Trump is sounding more and more like a mob boss. At a press pool this morning, he referred to America as “this thing of ours.”

html: Today everyone is rightly praising the courage and wisdom of John McCain. To truly honor the man, let's all try and follow his lead.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GjgM9ysRwXI …
text: Today everyone is rightly praising the courage and wisdom of John McCain. To truly honor the man, let's all try and follow his lead.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GjgM9ysRwXI …

html: I hope when I die, Madonna says nice things about herself.
text: I hope when I die, Madonna says nice things about herself.

html: This is the 3rd time I've tried hitchhiking to work and it's the 3rd time I've been picked up by @JoeManganiello who was again "just in the neighborhood."
text: This is the 3rd time I've tried hitchhiking to work and it's the 3rd time I've been picked up by @JoeManganiello who was again "just in the neighborhood."

html: The following random syllables are hereby offered as names for your new app: Buzu, Spotchi Jimsin, Plantic, Tanco and Spoob.
text: The following random syllables are hereby offered as names for your new app: Buzu, Spotchi Jimsin, Plantic, Tanco and Spoob.

html: On my recent trip to wherever, I couldn't believe how great that thing was.
text: On my recent trip to wherever, I couldn't believe how great that thing was.

html: Besides biting into it, what’s the best way to find out if a loose battery is good?
text: Besides biting into it, what’s the best way to find out if a loose battery is good?

html: My writers are performing at Flappers tonight. I thought I'd stop by and say hi. See you there. http://flc.cc/5897BXV
text: My writers are performing at Flappers tonight. I thought I'd stop by and say hi. See you there. http://flc.cc/5897BXV

html: Just got asked to autograph a breast. My wife was nearby, so I told him “no.”
text: Just got asked to autograph a breast. My wife was nearby, so I told him “no.”

html: Just learned that when *I’m* one of the options, instead of “Marry, F*ck, Kill” people play, “Pretend You’re On a Call, Play Dead, Actually Die.”
text: Just learned that when *I’m* one of the options, instead of “Marry, F*ck, Kill” people play, “Pretend You’re On a Call, Play Dead, Actually Die.”

html: Someone is suing Canada Dry Ginger Ale because it contains no ginger, so I’d like to formally announce my lawsuit against Panda Express.
text: Someone is suing Canada Dry Ginger Ale because it contains no ginger, so I’d like to formally announce my lawsuit against Panda Express.

html: My son’s back-to-school backpack has a “burner phone your parents don’t know about” pocket.
text: My son’s back-to-school backpack has a “burner phone your parents don’t know about” pocket.

html: People need to stop making fun of Trump’s Space Force. I am all for this administration buying ideas from my 10 year old nephew Brandon.
text: People need to stop making fun of Trump’s Space Force. I am all for this administration buying ideas from my 10 year old nephew Brandon.

html: I'm glad the media is using her full name, "Omarosa Manigault-Newman," so I don't get her confused with other Omarosas.
text: I'm glad the media is using her full name, "Omarosa Manigault-Newman," so I don't get her confused with other Omarosas.

html: I bet even George Clooney wishes he was George Clooney.
text: I bet even George Clooney wishes he was George Clooney.

html: Attention Investors: Tiny, waist-high fireworks that pop softly and don't scare dogs.
text: Attention Investors: Tiny, waist-high fireworks that pop softly and don't scare dogs.

html: You can’t have fun anymore.pic.twitter.com/wgBXwZn9b3
text: You can’t have fun anymore.pic.twitter.com/wgBXwZn9b3

html: Without the moon, there would be no tides, and no name for what my brothers did to me.
text: Without the moon, there would be no tides, and no name for what my brothers did to me.

html: My wife caught me looking at Pinterest. I tried to cover it with a porn site, but she’s fast.
text: My wife caught me looking at Pinterest. I tried to cover it with a porn site, but she’s fast.

html: My kids don’t believe it when I tell them how in my day, you could get an avocado toast for just $7.
text: My kids don’t believe it when I tell them how in my day, you could get an avocado toast for just $7.

html: One thing you don't often hear: "Hey, Dolph! No, not you, the other Dolph!"
text: One thing you don't often hear: "Hey, Dolph! No, not you, the other Dolph!"

html: I'm going on tour and bringing some friends with me. Pre-sale tickets for my @nycomedyfest show on 11/8 at the @BeaconTheatre are available now with code: TNYCF http://nycomedyfestival.com/conan-obrien/ pic.twitter.com/qnYQ00TbVn

html: I’m taking Intro to Fortnite at the local community college. (That’s how Ninja did it, right?)
text: I’m taking Intro to Fortnite at the local community college. (That’s how Ninja did it, right?)

html: I’m starting a podcast about comity, it’s called What The Heck.
text: I’m starting a podcast about comity, it’s called What The Heck.

html: Okay, yep, that's on me, he got me good! (I just found out the recycling bin I've been using for 3 years was really @SachaBaronCohen all along.)
text: Okay, yep, that's on me, he got me good! (I just found out the recycling bin I've been using for 3 years was really @SachaBaronCohen all along.)

html: There's going to be a movie about this whole MoviePass - nevermind it just lost funding.
text: There's going to be a movie about this whole MoviePass - nevermind it just lost funding.

html: For the record, I don’t want Rudy Giuliani doing my eulogy.
text: For the record, I don’t want Rudy Giuliani doing my eulogy.

html: I’m taking comfort from the fact that those plans for making 3-D plastic guns were written by IKEA.
text: I’m taking comfort from the fact that those plans for making 3-D plastic guns were written by IKEA.

html: I just got instructions for how to print a 3-D "Pandora's Box."
text: I just got instructions for how to print a 3-D "Pandora's Box."

html: I don't know. Are we sure that was the LAST Airbender?
text: I don't know. Are we sure that was the LAST Airbender?

html: Just got a pool floatie shaped like friends that want to come over and hang out with me.
text: Just got a pool floatie shaped like friends that want to come over and hang out with me.

html: My son just came home from robotics camp. At least, I think that's him.
text: My son just came home from robotics camp. At least, I think that's him.

html: Around the third sangria, the women catch on that nobody invited me, but by then I’m off to the next book club.
text: Around the third sangria, the women catch on that nobody invited me, but by then I’m off to the next book club.

html: When I was a kid at sleep away camp, I still remember how exciting it was to get a letter from my Mom and Dad's attorney.
text: When I was a kid at sleep away camp, I still remember how exciting it was to get a letter from my Mom and Dad's attorney.

html: When I grill burgers, I take a tip from the restaurant guys and, at the last minute, sprinkle in just a hint of e.coli.
text: When I grill burgers, I take a tip from the restaurant guys and, at the last minute, sprinkle in just a hint of e.coli.

html: I thought the Shazam movie was about a superhero with the power to guess the name of any pop song.
text: I thought the Shazam movie was about a superhero with the power to guess the name of any pop song.

html: I truly hope there are people in France who believe that, in America, LeBron is known as TheBron.
text: I truly hope there are people in France who believe that, in America, LeBron is known as TheBron.

html: Just noticed the poster for Mamma Mia 2 features as many people of color as a poster of me.
text: Just noticed the poster for Mamma Mia 2 features as many people of color as a poster of me.

html: I have X-ray vision, but it only works on objects wrapped in very thin tissue paper. #ConanCon
text: I have X-ray vision, but it only works on objects wrapped in very thin tissue paper. #ConanCon

text: Every father wants to hear those precious words: "Daddy, I won the lottery."

text: Decades ago, James Brown tried to warn of our jobs being taken by sex machines, but would we listen?

text: Elon Musk didn’t save the Thai soccer team, but he will put them on a Tesla waitlist.

html: It’s so hot out I keep dunking my head into my relationship with my father.
text: It’s so hot out I keep dunking my head into my relationship with my father.

text: If someone ever body shames me I'm going to clap back. God, I'm lost.
